# Econometrics

## Introduction to Econometrics with R

***[Introduction to Econometrics with R](https://www.econometrics-with-r.org/index.html)*** by *Christoph Hanck, Martin Arnold, Alexander Gerber, and Martin Schmelzer*.


## The Effect

[The Effect](https://theeffectbook.net/index.html) by [Nick Huntington-Klein](https://www.nickchk.com/).



# Economics

## **Advanced Macroeconomics: An Easy Guide**
*By Filipe Campante, Federico Sturzenegger, Andrés Velasco*

The book was published on 11 October 2021 and can be accessed at this [link](https://press.lse.ac.uk/site/books/m/10.31389/lsepress.ame/).

PDF version of the book and some supplementary materials have been downloaded and were saved at the "Temporary_files" sub-folder of the "Library" folder.

# Forecasting

## Forecasting: principles and practice, 3rd edition

This is the book website for the book ***[Forecasting: principles and practice, 3rd edition (2021)](https://otexts.com/fpp3/)*** by *Rob J Hyndman and George Athanasopoulos*. The book can be viewed online.

The author's website can be found [here](https://robjhyndman.com/).







# Machine Learning

## An Introduction to Statistical Learning

This is the book website for the book ***[An Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications in R](https://www.statlearning.com/)*** by *Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani*. The PDF version of the book cab be downloaded and viewed online from this website. Further, data and other supporting materials such as Jupyter Notebook and R Markdown files are available.

Data for the book could also be found in my [GitHub site](https://github.com/stevenkhwun/Online-resources/tree/main/ISLR).

***[Mastering MATLAB, 2012 Edition](http://www.masteringmatlab.com/)***






# Python

## Python for Data Analysis

This is the book website for the book ***[Python for Data Analysis: Data Wrangling with pandas, NumPy, and Jupyter](https://wesmckinney.com/book/)*** 3rd Edition by *Wes McKinney*. The book can be viewed online from this site. 



# R

## **R for Data Science (2e)**
*By Hadley Wickham, Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel and Garrett Grolemund*

The book was published in June 2023 and its website can be found [here](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/). 

**Website and PDF copy of its 1st edition**

The first edition of the book, which was published in 2017, can be found [here](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/). The PDF copy of this book can be access in the following folder of the computer:

C:\\Library\\R\\Wickham_RFDS



## **Introduction to Data Science: Data Analysis and Prediction Algorithms with R**
*By Rafael A. Irizarry*


This book is now in the the second edition which is divided into two parts:

[Introduction to Data Science: Data Wrangling and Visualization with R](http://rafalab.dfci.harvard.edu/dsbook-part-1/).

[Advanced Data Science: Statistics and Prediction Algorithms Through Case Studies](http://rafalab.dfci.harvard.edu/dsbook-part-2/).


**Website and PDF copy of its 1st edition**

The first edition of the book can be found [here](http://rafalab.dfci.harvard.edu/dsbook/). The PDF copy of this book can be access in the following folder of the computer:

C:\\Library\\R\\Irizarry_ITDS




## **ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis (3e)**

This is the book website for the book ***[ggplot2: Elegant Graphics for Data Analysis (3e)](https://ggplot2-book.org/)*** by *Hadley Wickham, Danielle Navarro, and Thomas Lin Pedersen*. The book can be viewed online.

## **R Markdown Cookbook**

This is the book website for the book ***[R Markdown Cookbook](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown-cookbook/)*** by *Yihui Xie, Christophe Dervieux and Emily Riederer*. The book can be viewed online from this website.
